amendment.description: To provide for certain revisions to the bill, including providing for permanent authority for the Public Interest Declassification Board, and for homeland security civil rights and civil liberties protection.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3957 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3957 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S10384) To provide for certain revisions to the bill, including providing for permanent authority for the Public Interest Declassification Board, and for homeland security civil rights and civil liberties protection.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3957 proposed by Senator Collins.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3957 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
